mapper.update:
update user
loginNo = #{loginno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
entryTime = #{entrytime,jdbcType=DATE},
workState = #{workstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set loginNo = #{loginno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entryTime = #{entrytime,jdbcType=DATE}, workState = #{workstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
